column4: I'm still having problems with my Samba (Ubuntu 8.04). It keeps changing my samba password back to Unix one. Although i have changed these settings in smb.conf unix password sync = no and pam password change = no. How do i solve this problem?My smb.conf http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=796034
i believe somebody told you to try #samba
Usually samba is pretty quiet channel :(
